resources.title: Cybersource Official
resources.paymentOptionsHelpText: List of payment types which will be displayed in storefront
resources.merchantKeyIdLabel: Key Id (in case authentication type = http_signature)
resources.merchantsecretKeyLabel: Secret Key (in case authentication type = http_signature)
resources.keyAliasLabel: Key Alias (in case authentication type = jwt)
resources.keyPassLabel: Key Pass (in case authentication type = jwt)
resources.keyFileNameLabel: Key File Name (in case authentication type = jwt)
resources.saleEnabledHelpText: Indicates if authorizing and taking payment will be done at the same time for a particular payment mode
resources.payerAuthEnabledHelpText: Indicates whether Payer Authentication (3D Secure) will be enabled
resources.scaEnabledHelpText: If enabled, card holder will be 3DS challenged when saving a card (enforcing Strong Customer Authentication)
resources.networkTokenUpdatesHelpText: Subscribe to Network Token life cycle updates
resources.isCVVRequiredForSavedCardsHelpText: Is the CVV required when using a saved card.
resources.isCVVRequiredForScheduledOrdersLabel: CVV Required for Scheduled Order. [DO NOT EDIT]
resources.isCVVRequiredForScheduledOrdersHelpText: Is the CVV required for a Scheduled Order.
resources.googlePayEnvironmentHelpText: PRODUCTION: Used to return chargeable payment methods when a valid Google merchant Id is specified and configured for the domain. TEST: Dummy payment methods that are suitable for testing.
resources.googlePayGatewayHelpText: To retrieve payment and customer information from a payment gateway that's supported by the Google Pay API. Gateway's identifier, which is issued by Google
resources.googlePayGatewayMerchantIdHelpText: To retrieve payment and customer information from a payment gateway that's supported by the Google Pay API. Your gateway account Id, which is provided by the gateway
resources.googlePayMerchantIdHelpText: A Google merchant identifier issued after registration with the Google Pay Business Console. Required when PaymentsClient is initialized with an environment property of PRODUCTION. See Request production access for more information about the approval process and how to obtain a Google merchant identifier
resources.googlePayMerchantNameHelpText: Merchant name encoded as UTF-8. Merchant name is rendered in the payment sheet. In TEST environment, or if a merchant isn't recognized, a “Pay Unverified Merchant” message is displayed in the payment sheet
resources.googlePaySupportedNetworksHelpText: Comma separated list of networks. eg: 'AMEX,DISCOVER,INTERAC,JCB,MASTERCARD,VISA'
resources.applePayDisplayNameHelpText: Name to be displayed on Apple Pay payment sheet
resources.applePayInitiativeHelpText: A predefined value that identifies the e-commerce application making the request. For Apple Pay on the web use 'web'
resources.applePayInitiativeContextHelpText: Fully qualified domain name associated with your Apple Pay Merchant Identity Certificate
resources.applePaySupportedNetworksHelpText: Comma separated list of networks. eg: 'visa,masterCard,amex,discover'
resources.dmDecisionSkipHelpText: Indicates which payment modes should skip the decision manager step
